description: [Homepage] get the contents (title and abstract) for the Home page

[Menu] get the list of stories that composes the Menu, basically all stories tagged with `menu` tag. The `slug` property of each story is prefixed with `level-` followed by a number, this way the list is easily ordered. Every story has a `slug` property that is used as identifier
[level 1] Content of the object of type Story
[level 1] get all 'capsules' linked to the story with slug `level-01-journeys` that contains a geographic location
[Level 1] get all location linked to the video capsule stories mentioned to the story with slug `level-01-journeys`; return the list unsorted
[Level 1] get all stories mentioned to `level-01-journeys` (st Joseph Clinic with video cover is one of them)
[Level 1] get all properties and all related documents and related stories to `st-joseph-clinic`
Get all stories with the tag 'theme'
Get all stories that mention the story with the slug 'theme-02-reagir-a-lannexion'
Get the story with the slug 'theme-01-vivre-sous-lannexion'
Get the story with the slug 'theme-02-reagir-a-lannexion'
Get the story with the slug 'note-01-entering-the-war'
Get the story with the slug 'note-02-la-formation-dun-consensus-memoriel'
Get all documents/places that contain the word 'castle'
